entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Broken parameters passing in dotnet CLI 7.0.* #29396
  • Multi-targeting with AOT dependency results in duplicate conflicting builds #29395
  • Unable to obtain lock file access on '/tmp/NuGetScratch/lock/...' since .NET 7 #29394
  • Analyzers being run inside VS but not when building on command line #29391

Closed

  • dotnet user-jwts create error: '/' is invalid after a value. Expected either ',', '}', or ']'. Path: $ | LineNumber: 9 | BytePositionInLine: 2. #29390
  • CI test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.New.IntegrationTests.CommonTemplatesTests.AllCommonItemsCreate #29259

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for ClickOnce publish test failure #29399
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Skip a couple of tests failing in CI #29383

Updated

  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Pull razor dependencies from consolidate repo #29374
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure
